entry.title: Lightning Spec Meeting 2020/02/03
entry.summary: A short agenda has been prepared for the upcoming meeting of protocol developers on Monday, February 3rd. The agenda has been curated using a Github issue and includes topics such as pull request review, long-term updates, and research. The issue will be updated based on feedback received from other developers to ensure that all relevant topics are covered. The agenda includes specific items such as single-option large channel proposal, BOLT 7, gossip channel queries, trampoline routing proposal, and improving the gossip. The developers have been requested to inform the curator if they have any open issue, pull request, or other topic that should be discussed in the meeting.
